tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                     customer_id INT NOT NULL,
                     feedback_text TEXT,
                     rating INT);

CREATE TABLE chatbot_performance (performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                     chatbot_version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
                     performance_metric FLOAT,
                     feedback_id UUID,
                     FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES customer_feedback(feedback_id));

CREATE TABLE ChatbotLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  chatbot_id UUID,
  conversation_id UUID,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT
);
